newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela bolivar closes softer vs dlr at 474/475.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela bolivar closes softer vs dlr at 474/475.

text.p: The Venezuelan bolivar closed marginally softer in moderate trade at 474.00/475.00 per dollar, reversing its gains of the past two days, traders said.
On Wednesday the unit closed at 473.75/475.00/dollar.

"Demand was moderate but the Central Bank was still in there, selling dollars into the market, " said one trader, adding he saw little change for the rate in Friday's session. (( -- Ana Isabel Martinez, Caracas newsroom, 582 505 2600))
